text: Lee Kerslake (16 April 1947â€“ 19 September 2020) was an English singer- songwriter and drummer. He was best known as the longtime drummer and backing vocalist for the rock band Uriah Heep and for his work with Ozzy Osbourne in the early 1980s. On 19 September 2020, Kerslake died from prostate cancer at age 73. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:English rock singers Category:English rock drummers Category:Singer-songwriters from London Category:Musicians from London Category:British trumpeters
title: Lee Kerslake
